title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Experience the Convenience and Strength of Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags**

Are you tired of flimsy trash bags that rip and tear easily? Look no further than Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, designed to make cleaning up a breeze. Made from tear-resistant white plastic, these 13-gallon bags are perfect for your kitchen or office trash cans.

Each bag features a convenient red drawstring closure that makes it easy to tie up and dispose of trash. With 50 bags per pack, you'll have a steady supply to keep your space clean and tidy. Plus, they're unscented, so you don't have to worry about overpowering fragrances.

What sets Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags apart is their Flex-tra strength, which provides added durability and resistance to tears. Whether you're dealing with everyday household waste or messy projects, these bags can handle it.

And for added convenience, Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags are compatible with Amazon Alexa voice shopping, making it easy to reorder when you need more.

Upgrade to the strength and convenience of Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Order now and experience the difference for yourself!

**Key Features:**

* 50 unscented 13-gallon trash bags per pack
* Made from tear-resistant white plastic
* Red drawstring closure for easy tie-up and disposal
* Flex-tra strength for added durability and resistance to tears
* Compatible with Amazon Alexa voice shopping
* Perfect for kitchen or office trash cans
